name: Hsagrath
conimmunities: Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, Poisoned

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The hsagrath is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the hsagrath must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster’s spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the hsagrath remains motionless and isn’t flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal chain.

traits.name: Fiendish Humor
traits.desc: When a target reaches 0 hit points, a hsgarath will release and seek a new target.

actions.name: Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 30 ft., all targets within range. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8+3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (Escape DC 16). A grappled opponent takes 12 (2d8+3) bludgeoning damage at the beginning of its turn. The hsagrath can’t make any other attacks while it has a creature grappled.
